“I desperately crave and loathe attention.”

Jan 19, 2008

My recent strategy for snapping out of it when I feel sorry for myself is to read someecards. This ecard service has all the snark and irony that I adore, in a format that is marginally more palatable than saying it outright. I just can’t take myself seriously when reading these. If I’ve sent you one recently, it means I appreciate you taking me only as seriously as is healthy. Here are a few I’ve enjoyed:
